Package primitives

Class Vector

java.lang.Object
primitives.Vector
public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
Vector class is used to present a vector with head point
Author:
Hilla and Oria

      Head - the head point of the vector
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the vector is the zero vector

    • Vector

      public Vector​(double X, double Y, double Z)
      A constructor for Vector that gets the head point by coordinates and checks that it's not the zero vector
      Parameters:
      X - first coordinate of the point
      Y - second coordinate of the point
      Z - third coordinate of the point
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when the vector is the zero vector
